name: Exploring the old age ceramic crafting village - Bát tràng
description: Situated on the left bank of the Red River, about 10km away from the center of Hanoi. Bat Trang is one of the most accessible village from Hanoi. You will have chance to see colorful and various of ceramic products and you also have chance to witness the process of molding and carving clay pots, dishes and vases.
